    • Sport

      Join us at the Games Activities...

      Awards presented

      Sport Awards

      Winner of each Sport Award is the organisation accumulating the most Games Points in each sport.

      Group Awards

      The Groups are based on an organisation’s overall team size entered in the Games. Games Points are tallied to determine the winner in each of the Groups. Organisations must be entered in more than one event to qualify.

      Medallist Award

      This award is presented to the organisation winning the most medal points based on medals won.

      Sport for Life Award

      The Sport for Life Grand Award is presented to the organisation entering the most participants. It recognises the effort and commitment it takes to organise a large team and the organisation’s contribution to fitness, health, company spirit and morale. ANZ have won this award since 2003.

      Pullman and Mercure Awards Party

      • Venue Pullman and Mercure Albert Park, 65 Queens Rd Melbourne

      • Monday November 25 6:30-8:00pm

      • Presentation of the Corporate Awards listed below by the Games special guest

      • Cocktail party with beverages, tickets are $35 per person

      • Contact the Games office on info@corporategames.net.au or 02 8354 0216 for information
